message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, even at this price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $6,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $6,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000, which is a very reasonable offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
